      • AbstractParticleEmitter.Particle

        public AbstractParticleEmitter.Particle(SylverVector2f pos,
                                SylverVector2f velocity,
                                SylverVector2f acceleration,
                                Color color,
                                float scale,
                                float growth,
                                int ttl)
        A particle emitted by the particle emitter
        Parameters:
        pos - Initial position of the particle relative to the world
        velocity - Initial velocity of the particle
        acceleration - Initial acceleration of the particle
        color - color of the particle
        scale - scale of the particle
        growth - growth of the particle
        ttl - time until dissipation in game ticks
